subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Court permits White House outreach to religious charities

06/25/07 10:45 AM, EDT
The Supreme Court has upheld the legality of an internal White House office that forcefully pushes federal aid for religious charities, a case with an unusual nexus of constitutional, financial and political implications.
FULL STORY
